title: Setting Up a Nintendo Switch Lite Lifestyle - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.11.19
description:
Get started with the Hims complete hair kit for just $5 today right now at http://forhims.com/GAMESDAILY.

Andrea and Greg break out the white board to explain how to get around your Nintendo Switch having to always be online.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:48 - Housekeeping
Live recording of PSVR and Gamescast this afternoon at patreon.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:06 - Switch is updating its CPU and Storage, Sean Hollister @ The Verge
00:07:05 Best Friend Q. - Secondary Switches need internet to play! - Matt Council
00:16:04 - Call of Duty Announces 2v2 Gunfight Mode
00:18:05 - Two New Modes for The Dark Pictures Anthology -- Man Medan
00:25:16 - Facebook after Triple As? RV @ GIB
00:30:25 - Out today
00:34:30 -  Him
Reader mail   -
00:35:55 - How does gaming marketing keep making mistakes with announcements? - The Nano Biologist
00:41:45 - Can you describe what Death Stranding is? - Ignacio Rojas
00:48:40 - How do you'll handle meeting influential people in our industry? - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:58:05 - Squad Up:Jonathan Cardwell(Xbox and i have recently started dabbling with PC for that great game Turbo Tax) - Thatguy1185
00:58:35 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
